build.buildCommand: composer install --no-dev --optimize-autoloader && npm ci && npm run build

deploy.startCommand: mkdir -p storage/framework/cache/data storage/framework/sessions storage/framework/views storage/logs && chmod -R 775 storage bootstrap/cache && php artisan config:clear && php artisan view:clear && php artisan cache:clear && php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=$PORT
